Articles.Content: Who are all the different Kerbals in the game named after?

They are randomly generated from a list of name parts. The only two kerbals to be named after someone are Wernher von Kerman and Gene Kerman.

"Gene is based upon Gene Kranz, former NASA director and manager." and Wernher is based on Wernher von Braun, "Wernher Magnus Maximilian, Freiherr von Braun (March 23, 1912 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ June 16, 1977) was a German-American rocket scientist, aerospace engineer, space architect, and one of the leading figures in the development of rocket technology in Nazi Germany during World War II and, subsequently, the United States."
And they're not in the game yet.

Kurt Kerman

Not official.

On a related note, how many kerbal names can be in the persistence file? Is there a maximum? also, I've learned how to change the names of existing kerbals but is there a way to feed KSP a list of names to have it auto generate kerbals for?
I believe Kurt Kerman is official, if you watched the livestream when the team was on, they said it would be added to the list of names in .17

I believe Kurt Kerman is official, if you watched the livestream when the team was on, they said it would be added to the list of names in .17

Oh. The 3d glasses weren't official though.

Ha! I have yet to find the fabled Wernher Von Kerman, although I hope I do soon!
Gene Kerman and Wernher Von Kerman don't generate as playable characters, but they serve as instructors in the tutorials!
